channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: ‘Mrs. Doubtfire’ scandal: How an Italian man dressed up as his dead mother to pocket pension for years
The fall of Brazil’s Jair Bolsonaro, who once said he would never be imprisoned
Who was Joan Branson, Richard Branson’s wife, who passed away?
Dan Driscoll: Trump’s ‘drone guy’, central to the US plan to end Russia-Ukraine war
History Today: How India chose its future with the adoption of the Constitution
FirstUp: India to get Commonwealth Games 2030 hosting rights, UK budget presentation... The news today
Head-on | The West’s veto over India’s rise has expired
item.description: The outcome a declining West fears most is one Asian power, China, being joined at the top by another Asian power, India. The West’s veto to prevent that outcome, however, has expired

item.title: G20 Johannesburg summit affirmed India’s stature and PM Modi’s status
item.description: With Vladimir Putin and Xi Jinping absent, Prime Minister Narendra Modi was the senior-most statesman present at the summit and he played the role with confidence

item.title: India-Israel FTA talks signal how middle-power democracies can shape global economy
item.description: The world’s most populous country is no longer just a market; it is a gateway to Asia and potentially one of the most influential actors shaping the global economic order. Israel’s decision to fast-track the trade agreement talks reflects this recognition

item.title: Dharmendra: An everyman superstar trapped in his own ‘He‑Man’ image
item.description: If the ever-simpleton Jat in Dharmendra endeared him to the masses, his ‘He‑Man’ persona trapped him, overshadowing the versatility of his earlier roles

item.title: How PM Modi’s six proposals at G20 summit can redefine global cooperation
item.description: The proposals represent a conceptual reorientation of global cooperation, integrating cultural resources, demographic potential, scientific collaboration, environmental stewardship, and collective security

item.title: How US-Saudi strategic convergence opens opportunities for India
item.description: The US-Saudi re-alignment is not a closing of geopolitical space; it is a reshaping of it. India need not choose sides — only its own interests
